Scott Weaver – Senior WordPress Engineer

Summary

I have over 15 years of professional experience in web development, focused primarily on PHP-based platforms. For the past 6 years, I've worked extensively with WordPress from back to front. And for 5 of those years, I have also been using React/Redux to build enhanced experiences. I also have great experience in the eCommerce space. I write clean code with easy-to-read documentation, have strong analytical skills and love bug solving, learning and a good challenge.

Skills/Tools

  • Platforms: WordPress (WPCS + Gutenberg), Magento
  • Progamming Languages: PHP 7, JavaScript ES6/ES7/Node.js, CSS, SCSS/LESS/Stylus, HTML5, MySQL
  • Frameworks: React, Redux, Node.js, Express, Laravel, Zend Framework
  • Automation Software: Docker, VVV, Webpack, Gulp, Grunt, Jenkins
  • Methodologies: Agile + Scrum (Jira/Confluence), Object-oriented Programming (OOP), Gitflow (Git/Github/Gitlab)
